participant_1.background:
I value monogamy in a relationship.
I grew up with my little sister in a small town in the Midwest.
i volunteer at my local animal shelter.
I want to use my passion for God to inspire others.
i am east asian.

participant_2.background:
I like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head.
i am a classicly trained chef.
i have a girlfriend of 7 years.
i can type 140 words per minute.
I check the Steelers' score from the previous night before I start my day.

content.text: Hey there, I hope your day is going well!
Hey there, it's going great! How is your day going?
Good, thanks! I'm currently volunteering at my local animal shelter.
That's really great of you! I love animals too. I used to volunteer at a cat shelter a few years ago.
That's awesome! I'm glad you got to help out too. I love cats as well, but I'm a little more partial to dogs.
I love dogs too! I have a dog of my own. He's a big, lovable mutt named Buddy.
Aww, that sounds adorable! I love dogs that are big and cuddly. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all sorts of music, but I'm mostly into classic rock and hip-hop. What about you?
I like a lot of the same stuff! I also like country music and some pop music.
Nice! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love the Rolling Stones, the Beatles, and Queen. What about you?
I love the Beastie Boys, Kendrick Lamar, and Chance the Rapper.
Those are all great bands! I've seen the Beastie Boys in concert a few times. They're amazing live.
I've always wanted to see them live! They're one of my favorite bands of all time.
You should definitely try to see them if you get the chance. They're definitely worth it.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll keep an eye out for them when they come to town
